mapper.sql: product.`product_id`, product.`brand_id`, product.`state`, product.`discount`, product.`category_node`, product.`name`, product.`cover`, product.`img_list`, product.`is_discount`, product.`recommended`, (SELECT MIN(sku.`price`) FROM sku WHERE sku.`product_id` = product.`product_id`) AS `price`, (SELECT MIN(sku.`discount_price`) FROM sku WHERE sku.`product_id` = product.`product_id`) AS `discount_price`
